text: Happy Death Day 2U is a 2019 American science fiction black comedy slasher movie written and directed by Christopher Landon. It stars Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard, Suraj Sharma, and Steve Zissis. The movie is a sequel to 2017's Happy Death Day, with Jason Blum. The movie was released in the United States on February 13, 2019, by Universal Pictures. It received generally positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2019 science fiction movies Category:2019 horror movies Category:2019 comedy movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:Movies about death Category:American serial killer movies Category:American sequel movies Category:2010s black comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:2010s sequel movies
title: Happy Death Day 2U
